configStructure.name: endpoint
configStructure.description: The url to access the S3 Server. This should be a valid S3 endpoint. By default it will connect to amazon's S3 endpoint. Examples- https://play.min.io:9000, https://s3.amazonaws.com

configStructure.name: bucketName
configStructure.description: Name of the bucket in which you want to upload this artifact. Note: If the bucket doesn't exist, it will be created.
